LanguageData.SK_Agriculture.label: Agriculture
LanguageData.SK_Agriculture.description: Learn the basics of agriculture on this new world. Allows the growing of new crops which are native to this planet. Unlocks the ability to cultivate corn, rice and strawberries. Unlocks the secret of hydroponic gardening. Also unlocks fences to help with your outdoor aesthetic needs.
LanguageData.SK_VegetablesI.label: Vegetables Research I
LanguageData.SK_VegetablesI.description: Allows the growing of some basic vegetables and plants, such as carrots and onions.
LanguageData.SK_VegetablesII.label: Vegetables Research II
LanguageData.SK_VegetablesII.description: Further advancements in agriculture enables the ability for your colonists to grow new vegetables and plants, such as Cabbage and eggplants.
LanguageData.SK_FruitsI.label: Fruits Research I
LanguageData.SK_FruitsI.description: Allows the growing of different fruits, such as cloudberry and gooseberry.
LanguageData.SK_FruitsII.label: Fruits Research II
LanguageData.SK_FruitsII.description: Further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow blueberries
LanguageData.SK_CerealsI.label: Cereals Research I
LanguageData.SK_CerealsI.description: Allows the growing of different cereals, such as oats.
LanguageData.SK_CerealsII.label: Cereals Research II
LanguageData.SK_CerealsII.description: Further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow corn and wheat.
LanguageData.SK_CerealsIII.label: Cereals Research III
LanguageData.SK_CerealsIII.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow new cereals, such as rice.
LanguageData.SK_OrchardsI.label: Orchards cultivation I
LanguageData.SK_OrchardsI.description: Allows the growing of amazing orchards, consist of oranges and peaches.
LanguageData.SK_OrchardsII.label: Orchards cultivation II
LanguageData.SK_OrchardsII.description: Further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow grape and bananas.
LanguageData.SK_OrchardsIII.label: Orchards cultivation III
LanguageData.SK_OrchardsIII.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow new orchard trees, such as apples.
LanguageData.TreeSowing.label: Trees cultivation I
LanguageData.TreeSowing.description: Allows the growing of bamboo and cecropia trees for lumber.
LanguageData.SK_TreesII.label: Trees cultivation II
LanguageData.SK_TreesII.description: Further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow birches and poplars.
LanguageData.Cocoa.label: Trees cultivation III
LanguageData.Cocoa.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow new trees, such as oaks, pines and teaks.
LanguageData.SK_FiberCropsI.label: Fiber agriculture I
LanguageData.SK_FiberCropsI.description: Allows the growing of fiber crops, such as cotton and building Fabric Hamper for tailoring.
LanguageData.Devilstrand.label: Fiber agriculture II
LanguageData.Devilstrand.description: Further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow devilstrand.
LanguageData.DevilstrandI.label: Fiber agriculture III
LanguageData.DevilstrandI.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow hevea trees.
LanguageData.SK_MedicalCropsI.label: Medical agriculture I
LanguageData.SK_MedicalCropsI.description: Allows the growing of medical crops.
LanguageData.SK_MedicalCropsII.label: Medical agriculture II
LanguageData.SK_MedicalCropsII.description: Further advancements in medical agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow aloe.
LanguageData.SK_MedicalCropsIII.label: Medical agriculture III
LanguageData.SK_MedicalCropsIII.description: Even further advancements in medical agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow hypericum, mint and wild rose, but only in Hydroponic Basins.
LanguageData.SK_TropicalCropsI.label: Tropical cultivation I
LanguageData.SK_TropicalCropsII.label: Tropical cultivation II
LanguageData.SK_TropicalCropsII.description: Further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow cocoa.
LanguageData.SK_TropicalCropsIII.label: Tropical cultivation III
LanguageData.SK_TropicalCropsIII.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow coffee and tea. Also unlocks Coffee Table for making some hot drinks.
LanguageData.SK_DrugCropsI.label: Drugs research I
LanguageData.SK_DrugCropsI.description: Allows the growing some plants for making drugs.
LanguageData.DrugProduction.label: Drugs research II
LanguageData.DrugProduction.description: The basics of drug preparation and synthesis. Allows creation of the drug lab. Further research is required to make specific drugs.
LanguageData.PsychiteRefining.label: psychite refining
LanguageData.PsychiteRefining.description: Learn to refine psychoid leaves into flake and yayo, different forms of the euphoric drug psychite.
LanguageData.WakeUpProduction.label: wake-up production
LanguageData.WakeUpProduction.description: Your chemists learn the formulas and techniques for synthesizing wake-up, a work performance-enhancing drug.
LanguageData.GoJuiceProduction.label: go-juice production
LanguageData.GoJuiceProduction.description: Learn to produce the synthetic combat-performance-enhancing drug go-juice.
LanguageData.PenoxycylineProduction.label: penoxycyline production
LanguageData.PenoxycylineProduction.description: Learn to produce penoxycline, a disease prevention drug.
LanguageData.SK_FlowersI.label: Flowers cultivation I
LanguageData.SK_FlowersI.description: Allows the growing of simple flowers: Astralagus, Crocus, Venus, Rosebay and Dandelion. Also your colonists may build Plant Pot now.
LanguageData.SK_FlowersII.label: Flowers cultivation II
LanguageData.SK_FlowersII.description: Allows the growing of more simple flowers: White rose, Daylily and Delphinium.
LanguageData.SK_FlowersIII.label: Flowers cultivation III
LanguageData.SK_FlowersIII.description: Further advancements in agriculture and flowers gives your colonists the ability to grow beautiful roses.
LanguageData.SK_LivestockI.label: Animal husbandry I
LanguageData.SK_LivestockI.description: Allows the building of Animal Sleeping Box and growing hay for some domestic animals.
LanguageData.SK_LivestockII.label: Animal husbandry II
LanguageData.SK_LivestockII.description: This allows your colonists to make silage, scratching post and food bowl for animals.
LanguageData.SK_LivestockIII.label: Animal husbandry III
LanguageData.SK_LivestockIII.description: Allows your colonists to build Animal Beds for their pets.
LanguageData.SK_FishingI.label: Fishing I
LanguageData.SK_FishingI.description: Allows your colonists to build Fishing Pier near deep water for fishing.
LanguageData.SK_FishingII.label: Fishing II
LanguageData.SK_FishingII.description: Allows your colonists to build Aquaculture Basin for growing fish.
LanguageData.SK_SoilFertillizationI.label: Soil fertillization I
LanguageData.SK_SoilFertillizationI.description: Further advancements in agriculture give your colonists the ability to fertilize the soil and do minor terraforming.
LanguageData.LandReclamation.label: Terraforming
LanguageData.LandReclamation.description: Time to get your feet wet or the ones of your enemies. A work intensive time awaits your colonists if they want to form the planet to their needs. Unlocks the potential to place water or floors anywhere. Enables your colonists to fill deep water holes to shallow ones and build there.
LanguageData.SK_SoilFertillizationII.label: Soil fertillization II
LanguageData.SK_SoilFertillizationII.description: Even further advancements in teraforming give your colonists the ability to change the terrain.
LanguageData.SK_Bridges.label: Bridges
LanguageData.SK_Bridges.description: Mind the gap or use a bridge to cross it. Enables your colonists to place foundations in shallow water. On these you can place bridges or platforms.
LanguageData.MoisturePump.label: Soil fertillization III
LanguageData.MoisturePump.description: Advanced knowledge of this planet's environment gives your colonists the ability to terraform. This unlocks the Fertilizer Pump and Moisture Pump which allows you to slowly create farmable soil anywhere.
LanguageData.SK_IndoorFarming.label: Indoor farming
LanguageData.SK_IndoorFarming.description: A gateway tech into learning to grow crops indoors. More research needed to actualy use the reserach.
LanguageData.Hydroponics.label: Hydroponics I
LanguageData.Hydroponics.description: Increased familiarity with the planet's environment unlocks the secret of hydroponic gardening. This allows your colonists to build the hydroponic basin to allow for indoor gardening.
LanguageData.SK_HydroponicsII.label: Hydroponics II
LanguageData.SK_HydroponicsII.description: Unlocks the secret of advanced hydroponic gardening with Advanced Hydroponic Basin.
LanguageData.Fungiponics.label: Fungi I
LanguageData.Fungiponics.description: Research how to adapt the hydroponics tables to grow cave plants, such as champignon and glowbuld. Also unlocks Fungiponics Basin for them.
LanguageData.SK_FungiII.label: Fungi II
LanguageData.SK_FungiII.description: Allows the growing of shimmershrooms on your Fungiponics Basins.
LanguageData.SK_FungiIII.label: Fungi III
LanguageData.SK_FungiIII.description: Allows the growing of gleamcap on your Fungiponics Basins.
